participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Analytical and creative, enjoys problem-solving and exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: My mom raised me by herself and taught me to play baseball. I blog about salt water aquarium ownership. I still love to line dry my clothes. I am allergic to peanuts. I will one day own a ferret.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and family-oriented, enjoys cooking and creating a warm home environment.
participant_2.background: I work for an online company from home. I am a soccer mom. I cook every night. I love family time.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to cook and spend time with my family.
That's great! I also love to cook, but I don't have a lot of time for it with my job.
What do you do for work?
Oh, cool! I work for a company that develops software for the online gaming industry.
That sounds like an interesting job.
It is! I get to work on some really cool projects.
Do you like working from home?
I do! I get to have a lot more flexibility in my schedule.
That's one of the things I like about my job too.
What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games and read.
I love to play video games too! What games do you like to play?
I like to play a variety of games, but I'm really into the Assassin's Creed series right now.
I've heard good things about that series. I've been meaning to try it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
